sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yue shui bu tiao 月水不調 . Qian jin yi fang 千金翼方 7 ：小五石澤蘭丸，主 婦人勞冷虛損，飲食減少，面失光色，腹中冷痛，月候不調 , “The ‘small pills with the five mineral substances and ze lan ’ cure women suffering from exhaustion cold and depletion harm. They drink and eat little. Their facial complexion has lost its glossiness. They feel a cold pain in their abdomen, and they experience menstrual irregularity ”.
